headline: Emerging Memory and Storage Technology Market Analysis Report 2025-2034 | AI and HPC Boom Fuels Surging Demand for Fast, Low-Power Memory Devices
summary: The global emerging memory and storage technology market is experiencing rapid growth as semiconductor giants, such as TSMC, Samsung, Micron, and Intel, collaborate with specialist IP providers to commercialize advanced non-volatile solutions. Over the past two years, technologies like Phase Change Memory (PCM), Resistive RAM (RRAM), and Spin-Transfer Torque MRAM have moved from labs to pilot-production at sub-22 nm nodes, utilizing 3D stacking for competitive densities.
